data.title: Beth Howe
data.meta_description: Art Chadwick joined SiTime in 2019, bringing 40 years of experience working for Silicon Valley based technology companies.
data.text: Beth Howe is the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer (CFO). In this role, she serves as a strategic advisor to the business and is responsible for all aspects of financial operations including accounting and reporting, financial planning and analysis, business decision support, tax, audit, treasury, and investor relations. Prior to joining SiTime in 2023, Beth spent 17 years at HP Inc driving innovation and change in numerous finance leadership roles, most recently serving as the Chief Audit Executive from 2021 to 2023. In this role, she accelerated automation and integrated risk management leading the company’s internal audit program and oversight of enterprise risk management. During her time at HP, she held a series of executive positions, including CFO for HP’s multi-billion dollar Graphics Solutions Business, and Global Head of Investor Relations. Beth is also a strong advocate for sustainability and inclusion and was the Finance Executive Sponsor for Sustainable Impact. Earlier in her career, she held leadership positions at Silicon Graphics, a high-performance computing and advanced graphics computer company. Beth holds a BS in engineering and Master’s degree in Engineering Economic Systems and Operations Research, both from Stanford University.
